biotools.summary: nf-encyclopedia is a NextFlow pipeline specifically designed to analyze DIA proteomics experiment that leverage chromatogram libraries; however it is perfectly suited to analyze DIA proteomics experiments without chromatogram libraries as well. The nf-encyclopedia connects three open-source tools---MSconvert, EncyclopeDIA, and MSstats---to go from mass spectra to quantified peptides and proteins.
